A world of creativity awaits via
the \0Custom Designs Portal\0￿!\0\0You can download custom designs
from creators all over the world and
even share your own designs.\0\0Would you like to access
this internet kiosk?

A world of creativity awaits here at
the \0Custom Designs Portal\0￿!\0\0Would you like to access
this internet kiosk?

You can't use this kiosk until "free
communication with others" is
enabled in Parental Controls.

A world of creativity awaits within
the \0Custom Designs Portal\0￿! Are you
ready to access it online?

Your creator ID is currently visible
to other players on your passport.\0\0If you do not wish to share your
creator ID, you can hide it.
What would you like to do?

Your creator ID will no longer appear
on your passport.\0\0You can change this setting anytime
from this kiosk.

Your creator ID is not currently
visible to other players on your
passport.\0\0If you wish to share your creator ID,
you can change the setting now.
What would you like to do?

Your creator ID will now appear
on your passport.\0\0You can change this setting anytime
from this kiosk.

Welcome to the \0Custom Designs
Portal\0￿!\0\0This terminal will allow you to take
home a custom design made by this
dream provider.\0\0Would you like to connect to the
internet to check out this dream
provider's custom designs?

Welcome to the \0Custom Designs
Portal\0￿!\0\0Would you like to check out this
dream provider's custom designs?

You can't access the \0Custom Designs Portal\0￿ while network
communications are active.
Please shut down communications
from the airport counter and then
try again.

Only registered residents of
\0n\0\0￿ can use this
\0Custom Designs Portal\0￿.

You can't use the \0Custom Designs Portal \0￿when you are playing with
other island residents.
Please come back to use this kiosk
when you are playing alone.

You can't use the \0Custom Designs Portal \0￿when the gate in the airport is
open for visitors.\0\0Please try again when the gate in
the airport is closed.
